mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (userCode, userEmail, userName, userNick, userPw, userGender, userBirth) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{userPw}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth})
mapper.select: select userNick from users where userNick=#{userNick}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET userEmail=#{userEmail}, userName=#{userName}, userNick=#{userNick}, userBirth=#{userBirth} WHERE userCode=#{userCode}
UPDATE users SET userPw = #{userPw} WHERE userEmail=#{userEmail}
